name: Hopkin the Crop King
description:
Tap A/D OR Left/Right to hop

Hold Movement in the air to control your hop

Every third hop is a SUPERHOP

Collect Pumpkins and SECRET SEEDS.

You are Hopkin. A scarecrow like any other.

When Farmer Jones left for the market, he gave you one simple instruction. "Hopkin, look after the farm."

You thought it would be easy, but as soon as he left, a swarm of alien spacecraft descended upon the farm. They've shot holes in the ground and placed platforms everywhere! What's worse, they've even kidnapped Farmer Jones's prize cow, Creamy!

It's up to you, Hopkin. Defeat the aliens, save the farm and bring Creamy home.

Made by Russell and Pippa for Curdle Jam #10. Theme: Cream of the Crop

Music:
